channel.title: Mary McKenna on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Mary McKenna on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Birth family contact. Continuity or contamination?
item.description: MM - Mary McKenna BG - Barbara Godden Conversation between Mary McKenna and Barbara Godden about contact with birth parents. Recorded at a meeting of Scottish Attachment in Action in March 2012. MM Barbara has given permission to share some information about her family in relation to contact, so I am going to do a conversation, a Michael Parkinson conversation [laughter]. Barbara, you and your husband adopted 2 girls? BG That’s right.
